__TOC__

* Contact: Johanfornander
* Make: HP
* Brand: Pavilion
* Model: zd8054ea
* Website: http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/product?product=455597&lc=en&cc=us&dlc=en&submit.y=7&submit.x=2&lang=en&cc=us

=== Current Issues ===
* Built-in card reader not working
* Wireless button makes system freeze if pressed repeatedly
* Touchpad vertical scrolling works, but needs adjustment towards left side
* How to configure governor/speed throttling on both logical cpu:s
=== Hardware details ===
* CPU: Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 CPU 3.20GHz
* Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corp. 82801FB/FBM/FR/FW/FRW (ICH6 Family) AC'97 Audio Controller
* Graphics adapter: ATI Technologies, Inc. Radeon Mobility X600 (M24)
* Wired NIC: Realtek RTL-8139/8139C/8139C+
* Wireless NIC: Broadcom Corporation BCM4306 802.11b/g
